job description:
About Us

Foresite Capital is a multi-stage healthcare and life sciences investment firm that applies rigorous scientific and data-driven approaches to investment analysis. The firm has $2.2 billion under management. Foresite Capital takes a collaborative approach to investing with its portfolio companies by providing a multidisciplinary team of scientists, engineers, analysts, and clinicians who understand the unique business models in healthcare in addition to capital. The company aims to address areas of great unmet clinical need over the long term by funding promising healthcare and life sciences businesses at all stages of their life cycles. Foresite Capital is based in San Francisco with an office in New York.

Description

Foresite is seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our growing investment-focused data team. This person will work closely with our research analysts, clinical group, and broader investment team to build models, analyses and tools that materially impact the business. The ideal candidate will be comfortable across the full data stack, and have the ability to take projects through to completion independently.
Responsibilities
  • Build reproducible backtests for proposed models / algorithms
  • Investigate, identify, and acquire internal / external datasets
  • Contribute to the deployment and implementation of internal-facing investment services
  • Develop and improve forecast models
  • Assist the team with improvements to existing data infrastructure
  • Work closely with the investment team to manage priorities
Qualifications
  • Bachelors degree in computer science, or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience
  • 4+ years experience in data science, analytics and software engineering
  • 4+ years experience writing and optimizing SQL queries
  • Expert knowledge of Python, Scala, or comparable programming language
  • Expert understanding machine learning fundamentals
  • Familiarity and experience working with cloud databases
Additional Relevant Skills
  • Distributed computing platforms (Spark, Hadoop)
  • Cloud computing platforms (AWS, Google Cloud Platform)
  • Data warehouses (Redshift, BigQuery)
  • Data modeling and visualization
  • Experience in finance and accounting
  • Understanding of healthcare and life sciences industry
